title: I verified my LinkedIn identity. Here's what I handed over

aiHeadline: 1: LinkedIn's Identity Verification: Because handing over your soul wasn't enough, now they want your firstborn.

title: What not to write on your security clearance form (1988)

title: Why is Claude an Electron app?

aiHeadline: 3: Claude the Electron App: Because who needs speed when you can have a slow, resource-hungry app that makes your computer cry?

title: Andrej Karpathy talks about "Claws"

title: AI uBlock Blacklist
